Articles.Content:
I'm making a rocket building company and need a flag. I want it to have a particle collider tube like LHC and above that say Deadly Particles Inc.

Thank You.

If I had any art skill whatsoever, I would help you. I'm not even kidding. I'm having the same problem. I want a flag for my program ((the KARD-Stock Space Agency)), but I'm like, ....e at drawing on the computer. Maybe if I had an art tablet I wouldn't be.

-KARD-Stock Space Agency's Executive

Ah, well my photoshop skills are not exactly amazing, but I gave it a try. I tried to stylize it a bit, since flags with too much details tend to be undecipherable. You can interpret the ring a top view on a particle collider with the magnets around it or you can view it as a cutaway, with the particle beam in the middle.

The clean version:

The flag-version:

Well, I'm glad to be of service

Send me a picture if the flag makes it to the Mun.
